Posts.Content: Hi Haysie  I could have worked but I took advice from the Macmillan benefits specialist in Worcester, who clearly Indicated my benefits  woukd be better than ssp, so i chose financial security over the unknown and decided not to start the new job and signed a delayed start contract. Unfortunately the specialist wasn't so special and added 3 benefits together. The reality is each one cancels out the other.  My decision not to work and concentrate on  getting better was based on the advise I was given. I didn't i trusted the advisor and am in dire straits now.  Regards
